# verticalPagination

**Instance Property**

The vertical pagination to the specified mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var verticalPagination: NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The pagination modes are described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintInfo/PaginationMode]

## Pagination

- **horizontalPagination**: The horizontal pagination mode.
- **NSPrintInfo.PaginationMode**: Constants that specify the different ways in which an image is divided into pages.
